A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful. I've never seen such a disconnect between the critics consensus and the actual movie. Many of the critics made positive comparisons to Empire - and that carries significant weight for many Star Wars fans. I admit that raised expectations for me. I remember the first time I saw Empire Strikes Back. It was enchanting and mesmerizing and incredibly entertaining. And even though I was just a little boy\, I knew I had seen something special. Indeed\, Empire has become the measuring stick against which all Star Wars movies are measured. Unfortunately\, much against what the critics have said\, Star Wars 8 doesn't even come close to measuring up. I don't want to spoil any of the plot\, such as it is\, but if you're thinking about spending ten bucks a ticket maybe reconsider and wait till it comes out on rentals and spend far less. You'll probably thank me later. :)
